author: esiam
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is a fix for a stack buffer overflow problem, reported in issue #50145 from @Dr15Jones and @dan131riley.
In ASAN, UBSAN versions an error was observed during the harvesting step because of the ZGammaplusJetsPostProcessor.cc module. 
 
#### PR validation:

It has been validating using the harvesting step in an ASAN release of CMSSW without raising any error after the fixes. Also has pass code format checks.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:
This fix is included in the backport  #50137
title: fix stack buffer overflow problem in ZGammaplusJetsPostProcessor
